news.name: MINING STRIKE LOOMS
news.description: Asteroid miners in the Kuiper belt threaten strike action over pay disputes. Analysts warn of potential supply chain disruptions.

news.name: FUEL PRICE SPIKE
news.description: Unrest in the Helium-3 mining colonies causes brief panic in fuel markets. Prices expected to stabilize within the cycle.

news.name: TECH BREAKTHROUGH CLAIMED
news.description: NeoGen Industries announces 'revolutionary' energy efficiency module. Competitors remain skeptical until peer review.

news.name: PIRATE ACTIVITY INCREASES
news.description: Security forces report heightened pirate presence in sector 7-G. Traders advised to exercise caution, not panic.

news.name: TRADE ROUTE DISRUPTED
news.description: Navigation beacons offline in the Rigel system. Authorities promise swift resolution to the technical issues.

news.name: NEW MINERAL DEPOSITS FOUND
news.description: Prospectors discover promising asteroid field. Market analysts predict minimal impact on current commodity prices.

news.name: AI TRADING GLITCH
news.description: Minor irregularities detected in automated trading algorithms. Exchange officials assure markets remain stable.

news.name: SHIPYARD STRIKE ENDS
news.description: Labor dispute at Titan Shipyards resolved. Production expected to resume normal levels within standard cycles.

news.name: RESEARCH STATION LEAK
news.description: Containment breach at deep-space lab contained. No lasting environmental impact reported.

news.name: QUANTUM NETWORK OUTAGE
news.description: Temporary disruption in FTL communications. Backup systems maintain critical operations during repairs.

news.name: SMUGGLING RING BUSTED
news.description: Customs officials intercept illegal tech shipment. Market impact expected to be negligible.

news.name: WEATHER ALERT
news.description: Solar flares may disrupt navigation in the outer systems. No immediate danger to shipping lanes.
